Frequently Asked Questions

What is included in "One Time Payment"?

One time payment means you pay once and get lifetime access to your website. This includes all the features mentioned in your selected plan, with no recurring monthly or yearly fees. You'll own the website code and can host it on our recommended free hosting (GitHub Pages) or any hosting of your choice.

What does "Free Maintenance" include?

Free maintenance includes bug fixes, security updates, and minor content changes (up to 2 pages per month). Basic plan gets 6 months, Professional gets 10 months, and Advanced gets 1 year of free maintenance. After the free period, you can opt for our affordable maintenance plans.

What are domain and hosting charges?

Domain (your website name like www.yourcoaching.com) typically costs ‚Çπ500-‚Çπ800/year. Hosting (where your website files are stored) costs ‚Çπ1000-‚Çπ2000/year for reliable service. Basic plan uses free GitHub Pages hosting, while Professional and Advanced plans need paid hosting for full functionality.

How do I contact after selecting a plan?

When you click "Select This Plan", you'll get an option to contact us directly on WhatsApp. You'll be connected with our sales team who will guide you through the process, answer your questions, and help you get started with your website.
